skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smalltalk helper
des:
Small Talk Helper turns your Alexa-Device into a conversation starter. It suggests conversational topics that are either current, controversial, or clever. 

It connects to different sources to get you:
A) the title & abstract of a recent news story (pulled from today's most viewed New York Times articles)
B) a controversial issue along with some pros and cons
C) a clever idea or thought (pulled from today's top voted "Shower Thoughts" on Reddit)

It's a fun and easy way to get rid of awkward silence and find something to talk about. Give it a shot: Ask Small Talk Helper for a Conversation Starter!

If you want to reach out or simply say Hi - http://hinternesch.com/
Any feedback (or Small Talk...) is greatly appreciated!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
